documents.document: Great location, terrific staff Not only were we very impressed with this hotel, but so were 2 Parisian clients who got great service when they tried to contact me there. Fabulous location - a very short stroll to the Notre Dame, Sainte Chappele, Conciergerie, etc. Very quiet, with efficient attentive staff. Rooms and bathroom small, but well designed and nicely furnished. A real find.
